IDFirstDialogue: Welcome newbie as you are new we are going to introduce you to this world.
IDSecondDialogue: Let´s start with the basics slide your finger on the screen to move.
IDThirdDialogue: Well that's enough let´s do another thing. Quickly swipe your finger to Dash.
IDFourthDialogue: This can be used for dodging or other things.
IDFifthDialogue: Be careful the enemies are close
IDSixthDialogue: You did it well newbie but this is only the beginning
IDSeventhDialogue: Let's keep going to see how long you last.
IDEighthDialogue: We are at the end of the dungeon let's move forward carefully.
IDNinethDialogue: These boxes are good for us the more coins you get the better weapons you can have.
